statements: SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_behavior WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_behavior WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, demographic_segment FROM customer_purchase_behavior WHERE purchase_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_behavior WHERE demographic_segment IN ('Young Adults', 'Senior Citizens');
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_behavior WHERE purchase_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_behavior WHERE purchase_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_behavior WHERE demographic_segment = 'High Income' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount, demographic_segment FROM customer_purchase_behavior WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' OR purchase_amount < 5000
SELECT customer_name, demographic_segment FROM customer_purchase_behavior WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY purchase_amount ASC
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers, AVG(purchase_amount) AS avg_purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_behavior WHERE purchase_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000
SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseBehavior ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseBehavior WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseBehavior WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(purchase_amount) AS avg_purchase_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseBehavior;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM CustomerPurchaseBehavior WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseBehavior WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM CustomerPurchaseBehavior WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM BrandMarketingCampaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ORDER BY target_demographics ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM BrandMarketingCampaigns WHERE campaign_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM CustomerPurchaseBehavior WHERE purchase_amount < 500 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, email, gender FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, location, income FROM demographics WHERE income < 50000;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, location, income FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY income DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 3 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers c LEFT JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id WHERE d.location='New York' AND d.income > 50000 ORDER BY c.age ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100.00;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, age_group, location FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, product_name, quantity FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, age_group, location FROM customers JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id WHERE age_group = 'Adult';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE location='New York';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE location='New York';
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
